title: 574.17 SURETIES FOR PART OF PENALTY.
text: Sureties may be accepted, in the discretion of the approving officer or body, for a part only of the penalty, and may justify in separate and different sums; but the aggregate liability of the sureties shall in all cases be not less than that required by law if each surety had justified in the full amount.

variables.name: sureties
variables.description: An array representing the amounts justified by each surety.

variables.name: required_liability
variables.description: The total liability required by law if each surety had justified in the full amount.

variables.name: aggregate_liability
variables.description: The total liability covered by the sureties.

consequences: Sureties are accepted as they meet the required liability.
